thread.title: Danielle Lloyd: 'Jamie O'Hara beat with me a shoe and strangled me on horror holiday'

title: Danielle Lloyd: 'Jamie O'Hara beat with me a shoe and strangled me on horror holiday'
text:
'SON SAW BEATING' Danielle Lloyd: ‘Jamie O’Hara beat with me a shoe and strangled me on horror holiday’ 
Former beauty queen launched a scathing attack on her former partner online after he made a dig about her weekend away at a spa By Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter and Nicola Fahey, Bizarre Reporter 25th February 2017, 9:31 pm
